name: Purrfect Balance
description:
2022 Global Game Jam project.

Balance your soul and your body as you work through your daily struggles as a cat. Your soul and body need to perform different tasks to maintain a healthy life and help you get your girl!

Luna Wu: 2D Artist, 2D Animator, Narrative Designer

Kevin Gong: Composer, Sound Designer, Narrative Designer

Ashley: Narrative Designer, UI Designer

Bryan Leng: Project Manager, Programmer, Level & Narrative Designer
